column1: Uchi////This place is unreal. Best meal I've ever had and seemingly the most well run restaurant I've ever been too. All of the staff is happy
column2: friendly and seems to work well together. I've been to much fancier and expensive restaurants and none of them even come close to Uchi. Perfect mix of class and quality without all the pretense. Thanks for a great experience. BTW
column3: I hardly ever review places but this place earned it.
